summary.para: Supplies the analysis data to an analysis transform.

param.name: analysisData
param.para: The data that the transform will analyze.

param.name: analysisDataCount
param.para: The size of the analysis data.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The output of the transform will be copied to CPU-accessible memory by the imaging effects system before being passed to the implementation.
If this call fails, the corresponding instance is placed into an error state and fails to draw.

summary.para: Supplies data to an analysis effect.

remarks.para: This interface can be implemented by either an or an .
